description:
A compact saddle to make your race bike a lot more comfortable. When hammering up climbs or putting the power down on the flats, the Vento Argo R3’s short and wide design is both supportive and efficient. The short design and rounded nose of the Argo allows you to ergonomically deliver more power when in the drop, or any other time you are sit forward on the saddle.

  • Short design and rounded nose promotes a natural rotation of the pelvis, leading to a more aerodynamic body position and allowing you to deliver more power with less effort
  • Vento profile has been designed to be work best on bikes with aggressive racing geometry
  • K:ium rail is light, strong and provides a stiff connection between the shell and the seatpost
  • Carbon-injected nylon shell offers stiffness and power transfer
  • Large open cut-out design provides comfort while seated, especially while climbing
  • fizik’s Type 1 foam offers maximum comfort and power transfer without bulk
name: Fizik Vento Argo R3 Saddle - Unisex
